product.text:
Treasure Planet

Based on the popular Disney film, Treasure Planet combines the suspense of Robert Louis Stevenson’s Treasure Island with futuristic animation. In this novelization, Jim Hawkins finds himself thrust into the adventure of a lifetime after he finds a map to a treasure in the galaxy. When Jim joins a crew to search for the hidden treasure, he befriends a cyborg named John Silver. Jim soon discovers that Silver may not be a friend after all, and is dismayed to learn that the treasure is actually a trap.

Tie-in Activity: Surprise your child with a futuristic treat, such as spaceship pancakes, galactic granola, or cosmic cupcakes. For added fun, let her help with the preparation and clean-up.
